actions.text: Referred to the Committee on Rules.
Committee on Rules. Ordered to be reported without amendment favorably.
Committee on Rules. Reported to Senate by Senator Mathias without amendment. Without written report.
Placed on Senate Legislative Calendar under General Orders. Calendar No. 1257.
Resolution agreed to in Senate without amendment by Voice Vote.
Called up by House by Unanimous Consent.
Resolution Agreed to in House by Voice Vote.

official_title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the rotunda of the United States Capitol to be used on January 21, 1985, in connection with the proceedings and ceremonies for the inauguration of the President-elect and the Vice President-elect of the United States.

summary.text: Authorizes the use of the rotunda of the U.S. Capitol on January 21, 1985, in connection with proceedings and ceremonies for the inauguration of the President-elect and the Vice President-elect of the United States.

titles.title: A concurrent resolution authorizing the rotunda of the United States Capitol to be used on January 21, 1985, in connection with the proceedings and ceremonies for the inauguration of the President-elect and the Vice President-elect of the United States.
